text: What is the function of an audio source? Select one answer.

options.text: It plays any 2D audio or 3D audio that is within its range.
It is the master audio file, and can be edited and compressed to improve application optimization.
It is the audio reference added to a special effect volume, such as a reverb zone, and controls the properties of the effect.
It handles the basic properties of an audio clip, such as priority and volume, and plays the clip in the scene.

feedbackCorrect: The audio source is the object that appears in a scene and manages the actual playing and properties of a selected audio clip.
feedbackIncorrect: The audio source is the object that appears in a scene and manages the actual playing and properties of a selected audio clip.
